steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
In the Word Options dialog box, click on the 'Language' category on the left.
Under the 'Choose Editing Languages' section, click on the 'Add additional editing languages' button.
In the 'Add Languages' dialog box, select the desired language from the list.
Click on the 'Add' button to add the selected language to the editing languages list.
Click on the 'OK' button to save the changes and close the Word Options dialog box.
The default language for the document has now been changed to the selected language.
